posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi,
I have 9 tobacco coupons for sale or trade.  $20 each includes shipping. I will provide insurance for orders over $60.  Paypal, money orders and personal checks are all OK.  I will also trade for raw T206 and T205 commons that would grade in the 1.5-2.5 range.

SOLD

Thanks
Rick
